content.description: Start back in the cave. Continue right, passed 'Desolation of Smaug' and out of the cave to a tricky toe sequence. Avoids the slabby rock to the right.

Start sitting with a left hand crimp and right hand pinch. Pull up into the large hueco. Work your way left and out of the cave with the use of some decent intermediates and a large move to a great hold. do a few compression moves to get a bit of height and then head left to establish on the low angled face and top out with jugs.
content.location:
The Dragon's Lair area. There is no real trail down there yet, but stay tuned for specific directions. It is a cluster of boulders that forms a fairly large cave. If standing at the top of the Uvula, look straight out to the ocean. The Dragons Lair is 100 yards down that way and is marked by a tree coming out from between two very large boulders.

The Maw is on the North West side of the uphill boulder in the cave.

content.description: Start a few feet right of the arete with two crimps at about head height. Go straight up the gently overhanging wall without bailing to the arete. A bit spicy.
content.location: Dragons Lair (see The Maw), south side of the uphill boulder.

content.description: Start left hand on a side pull crimp and right in hueco. Make some sweet compression moves linking into The Maw and topping out of the cave.
content.location: In between The Butt Dragon and Game of Thrones.

content.description:
Start with left hand undercling, right on a crimp, with left foot pasted way out left in a heuco. Make some burly left hand moves passed slopers, and exit up the highball face on chickenheads.

Potential hard SDS (matched in the undercling) still open...
content.protection: Pad(s). Maybe pad the left rock that forms the cave for the exit if you're spooked.
content.location: In the Dragons Lair, through the Cave on the far side. In between The Maw and Lockjaw.

content.description: Start on the obvious rail at ~8 ft mark. Make a few hard moves right to a few small but decent slopers, then continue right to a few edges. Mantel up through the tree.
content.location: Dragon's Lair. South east corner of the downhill boulder. Start by the tree. End a few feet to the right of the tree trunk.

content.description: Start with the undercling in the cave. Make a big move to a blind crimp with the left, confure some magic trickery to reach the slopers and crimps and eventually crawl your way to safety from the Desolation of Smaug.
content.location: On the ocean side of the dragon boulder.

content.description: Starts on the face, to the left of 'Smaug'. Left hand in a hueco, right on a good incut, with foot on the 'Smaug' crimp. Once you get established passed the crux, you can traverse and exit right (boo!), or continue straight up for a Brickyard-esque topout. Quality sequence, and a perfect warmup for Smaug/Zendetta.
Awesome low start to The Maw (V5). Start on two bomber underclings and make your way with some fancy footwork to join up with and finish on The Maw. Don't lose core tension or cut feet for a second!
content.protection: Slider pads if any. It is very low! pads for The Maw perhaps
